alert.note: Alert for Northern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 01 at 2:13AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips and northwestern Valley Counties through 315 AM MDT... At 212 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northeast of Saco, or 24 miles east of Whitewater, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Of Opheim and Thoeny. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
